Segment_0.description: This segment has moderate transaction frequency and high transaction amounts with a significant preference for traditional payment methods over digital wallets. They show moderate city diversity and low international activity.
recommendations: Promote high-value savings and investment products
Introduce premium credit cards with benefits on traditional spending
Enhance customer loyalty through personalized financial advisory services
Segment_0.revenue_opportunity: Capitalize on high transaction values by offering tailored investment opportunities and premium banking services.

Segment_1.description: Highly active in transaction frequency with a strong inclination towards digital wallet usage. This segment shows good city diversity but very low international transactions, indicating a domestic focus.
recommendations: Develop partnerships with digital wallet providers to offer exclusive deals
Create digital-first banking products and services
Leverage data analytics to provide personalized offers and improve user experience
Segment_1.revenue_opportunity: Drive revenue through digital channels by offering tech-savvy financial products and leveraging partnerships with tech companies.

Segment_2.description: This segment exhibits high transaction frequency and amounts with a preference for digital and contactless payments. They have the highest city and country diversity, indicating frequent international activity.
recommendations: Offer multi-currency accounts and international transaction benefits
Promote travel-related insurance and benefits packages
Invest in technology to enhance security for international transactions
Segment_2.revenue_opportunity: Exploit the international and tech-savvy nature by offering global financial products and enhancing cross-border payment solutions.
